thread.title: SoftBank to help Saudis in world's biggest solar power firm

title: SoftBank to help Saudis in world's biggest solar power firm
text:
SoftBank to help Saudis in world's biggest solar power firm 11:08am EDT - 01:29 
SoftBank Group Corp's Vision Fund says it will invest in creating the world's biggest solar power project in Saudi Arabia, stepping up its involvement in the kingdom and expanding beyond technology. Sonia Legg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
SoftBank Group Corp's Vision Fund says it will invest in creating the world's biggest solar power project in Saudi Arabia, stepping up its involvement in the kingdom and expanding beyond technology.
